I love playing this game, always having fun and adrenaline!! The only only only bad thing is that if you are queing solo as a survivor, it takes several minutes to find a match. But it is totally amazing!

This game was once four 3rd grade kids running from a 6th grade bully and it was kinds fun. now that i come back to play with some friends i can see it has evolved. Now it four 5th grade kids trying to run from a high school dropout with anger issues and a air rifle that they got from  Papa's closet. Oh and don't forget the battle pass and paid DLC characters with all the op skills you could want. All they need are loot-boxes THE TRIFECTA!!!!!!! but in between the rage inducing killers that can one tap you from across the map. If you have some friends to party up with it's fun for a little wile. 

Until you see how most of the best killers are locked behind a pay wall and how many ranged attacks they have some that unless you have spider sense ya can't dodge SUUUUUPER FUN GETTING HIT FROM BEHIND A WALL OR A TREE THE ONLY THING YOU CAN DO TO AVOID THEM OR THE MANY INSTA DOWN ATTACKS
 
can't wait till they add a killer with an M16 that can see across the map with a heartbeat sensor that will drop you in one shot and kill you irl

I bought Dead by Daylight only 3 months after its initial release in 2016. I used to actively play this game from 2016 to around the middle of 2019. This game used to be one of my favorite games during this time. Something I’d play relatively frequently with friends, or to just mostly play killer. Do to various reasons in my life, I stopped playing for a little over two years up until a month or two ago.

This game, in the last two years, has changed drastically from the way it used to play and feel. They implemented a battle pass system and changed quite a few key aspects of how the game played. Almost all of these changes I’d argue were for the worse. 

This game is a shadow of its former self. I honestly can not recommend this game in its current state.  The community is several times more toxic than it used to be and the balance changes they’ve implemented into the game have completely fucked it. Matchmaking is all over the place, killers have been nerfed into the ground and survivors have been buffed to hell and back.

I can [b]not[/b] recommend this game anymore. BHVR actually doesn’t know how keep a game alive. I’ll be removing this game from my library permanently.

Dead by Daylight é um jogo extremamente viciante. 
Há duas formas de jogá-lo: 
1) Você pode simplesmente entrar no lobby e selecionar uma partida, sobreviver (ou morrer), ou ser um assassino e matar (ou perder os sobreviventes de vista, como acontece nas primeiras partidas). 
2) Você pode entrar na Névoa. A Lore do jogo é um pouco caótica no início, mas cada vez que você se aprofundar nela (como acontece ao upar uma personagem por meio da Teia de Sangue) você irá perceber que está descobrindo um pouco mais a respeito da essência de personagens que, em um primeiro momento, aparentam ser clichês, mas que depois de entender cada uma delas é possível identificar uma cumplicidade tanto ao jogar como sobrevivente quanto ao jogar como assassino.
As DLC compensam bastante porque expandem o universo, que já não é pequeno. Contudo, você pode aprender apenas com o jogo base antes de ter certeza de que deseja gastar seu dinheiro. 
Vale a pena ler as passagens e fragmentos presentes nos Arquivos e nas biografias das personagens para que você saiba o porquê de a assassina chamada de Espírito (Rin Yamaoka), por exemplo, possuir cacos de vidros em seu corpo; ou o porquê de a sobrevivente Claudette ter uma vantagem na qual ela pode se curar sem ajuda; ou o motivo das vantagens de Dwight visarem um trabalho em equipe. Após mil horas de jogo, com certeza recomendaria para qualquer um que me pedisse uma indicação para um jogo de terror.

I bought this game at £3-4, this is a good price for the game. I wouldn't have slept if I had paid a penny more for it. This games endless cycle becomes stale and boring within a couple of hours into playing, pro builds for both surv and killers often result in quick deaths. Killers tend to camp hooks once you are placed upon them result in quick, dull games. Get this game on sale, don't buy full price you will regret it.

I like this game and enjoy playing it, but its hard to recommend for new players.
The matchmaking is not new player friendly, and you can be matched with survivors or killers above your skill level. Killers often tend to rank down or smurf in order to play against newer, less-skilled players.

If you don't mind some frustrating matches early on, once you start getting better and learning the mechanics more, the game can be pretty fun. Otherwise, it might not be for you.

Am Anfang war es nicht schlecht und hat mir sehr gefallen aber mit der Zeit hat sich das verhalten geändert.
Mittlerweile ist es so es häuft sich das Killer viel Campen was den Spielspaß kaputt macht, und einen in rage versetzt wo man komplett ausrastet. Ich habe sogar schon mit dem Support darüber geschrieben, doch es ist eben Erlaubt und scheint auch nicht wichtig zu sein. Ich möchte nicht nur schlecht darüber reden, aber ich würde es in meinem Freundeskreis niemand Empfehlen zu kaufen.

Дрисня часов на 50. На убийцу (сурва) копишь около недели. баланса для новых игроков нет.  В игре только один режим. Ивентов за 5 лет существования игры тоже не было. Зато каждый квартал выходит новый сезон, новый ман и новый сурв (некоторых можно купить только за донат) Игра создает впечатление демо-версии (нельзя даже разрешение экрана в настройках поменять). Постоянно крашит сервера. Единственное что в игре тащит -  это атмосфера. Первые 30 часов сраться приходится от каждого звука на карте, но потом розовые очки спадают и игра превращается в один и тот же режим с лагающими серверами, ебанутым комьюнити и ненормальным балансом.
recomiendo este juego 100 x 100 por que es un juego muy competitivo y de gran variedad de personajes ademas que puedes jugar con tus amigos y hablar

I would really recommend this game for anyone who wants to play a multiplayer horror game. There is so many different characters to play and they also have unique perks for every person. If you level up your character enough other characters will be able have their perks too. I originally played it on Ps4 before switching to pc and this was one of my favorite games.

--Edit--
MMR has ruined this game. I cannot find the joy to play it anymore on top of the terrible balance. BHVR continues to ignore the player base when it comes to solving this issue. It's been gathering dust for the last few months and I fear it will continue to do so for the near future. Cannot recommend unless you only play survivor or have a survivor group to play with at this time.

--Original--
Despite what others may say, yes the developers can be annoying sometimes but overall this game has brought me so much joy in the years I've played that I cannot not give it a recommendation. If you're looking for the best of the best when it comes to asymmetric horror games then this will be right up your alley. Tons of fun for both sides.
